Text:
Okay, so I pretty much heard Saga is the best thing written since Shakespeare. Let's see what all the hype is about.

Thanks for your contribution, as always, mirrormaster.
Any chance you could upload Locke and Key?
MM82, Just wanted to say thanks for this gem, and all your ULs! This is a really nice surprise and I can't wait to see more from this series. Thanks again!
I loved Y: the last man so hopefully this is good. I will start buying it if I enjoy it
